title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "As to Birnie, he is charged only by one witness,who had never seen him before, nor knew his name;

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Whereupon a warrand was issuedout against him, and he was apprehended and sent tothe Castle, and he proved to be one Birnie, a helperto the Countess of Weemys's coachman.
